Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.SettingEnableEffectsH: Turn on/off all visual effects for weapon rolls
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.SettingEnableMeleeEff: Turn on/off visual effects for melee weapon rolls
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.SettingEnableRangeEff: Turn on/off visual effects for ranged weapon rolls
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.SettingEffectFilesHin: Customize effect files for attacks (requires refresh)
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.SettingScaleFactorsHi: Customize scale factors for different success levels (requires refresh)
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.SettingDebugModeHint: Enable detailed console logging for troubleshooting
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.LogRollResultNotFound: Roll result not found, skipping Sequencer effect
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.LogAttackerNotFound: Cannot find attacker token (tried actorKey: {actorKey}, actorId: {actorId}), skipping Sequencer effect
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.LogUsingSelectedToken: No targetKey provided, using currently selected token: {tokenName}
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.LogNoTargetToken: No target token, showing effect at attacker location: {tokenName}
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.LogSequencerNotEnable: Sequencer module is not enabled, cannot play effect
Fvtt_CoC7th_Helper.LogWeaponRoll: CoC7 {attackType} weapon roll: {attackerName} vs {targetName}, weaponID: {weaponId}, result: {result}, effect: {effectFile}
